message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both move on.
Alice, I'm feeling generous, but let's make this a bit more equitable. 50/50 after inflation is more than fair to you.
Bob, time is money, and quite literally so in this case.  My offer is still generous. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer, or I'll be forced to propose even less next time!
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this back and forth is pointless. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further.
